content:
Fix:
修复国服推图类似13-A的ocr识别
修复即使报错也发送通知邮件的功能
修复多标签页面打开时，重启GUI命令窗口会导致多次更新API请求

Fix ocr recognition in national push map similar to 13-A
Fix sending notification emails even if an error is reported
Fix restarting the GUI command window when a multi-tabbed page is open will result in multiple API update requests
